attributes.action: Make it unlawful for any Strike to take place where it can endanger others
attributes.background: Due to once again doctors striking and putting the Heath of the patients behind there own needs something should be put in place to stop this. The nurses that hold the weight of the nhs and the military who are also underpaid don't strike so why do they.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what your petition is asking the Government to do. You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the laws relating to industrial action.
